title: Quanta Raytracing Engine
desc: Vulkan raytracer build with C++ and Vulkan.  Implmenting raytracing loop, materials, and vector math library

title: Scales App
desc: App to practice technique on instruments and force you to practice scales you might skip, plus track your practice statistics.

title: SousChef
desc: Platform facilitating cooking as a group, automating assigning tasks and planning (RecipeAI).

title: Native Blocks
desc: A headless, theme reactive UI library that gives you complete control.

title: SideChain
desc: Sidechain VST3 plugin for any DAW, featuring a visual graph for precise envelope adjustment. Easily create smooth, rhythmic volume effects for dynamic mixes or special effects.

title: Chemical Factory VR Simulator
desc: VR simulator developed to expose new graduates/hires to working in a chemical factory.  Participants complete real production tasks in the virtual reality environment guided by instructions.
